data.name: XModifiable2
desc: allows to control modifiable state change.

This interface allows to prevent changing of the modified state of the object. It is introduced for performance optimizations, to allow to prevent unnecessary updates, for example while importing a document. Please use this interface very carefully.

methods.name: disableSetModified
desc: disable possibility to change modified state of the document

methods.name: enableSetModified
desc: enable possibility to change modified state of the document

methods.name: isSetModifiedEnabled
desc: allows to detect whether the modified state change is enabled
